entries.title: FBI shuts down major ransomware gang that targeted schools, hospitals
entries.description: Attorney General Merrick Garland said the group — called Hive — hacked and demanded ransom from hospitals, school districts, financial firms and other entities.

entries.title: How to juggle multiple TV streaming services without missing a show
entries.description: Find out if it's okay to share your streaming password, how to save money with bundles, and the trick to pausing subscriptions.

entries.title: What Facebook and Trump have in common
entries.description: Facebook parent Meta announced former president Donald Trump will get his accounts back.
